description:
The Beauty is an upcoming FX on Hulu original series set to premiere in 2026, starring Ashton Kutcher.

This dark, provocative drama explores a near-future world where beauty is no longer natural — it’s engineered, monetized, and controlled. As society becomes obsessed with perfection, the cost of beauty may be far more dangerous than anyone imagined.

🎥 Series Highlights:

Prestige FX storytelling

Near-future sci-fi thriller themes

Psychological drama & social commentary

High-end cinematic production

⚠️ This trailer is a promotional preview compiled for entertainment purposes.
